title: The 'Top N' and 'Bottom N' do not work
description: When creating a new report, the 'Top N' and 'Bottom N' functionalities are not functioning correctly.
OB: The 'Top N' and 'Bottom N' functionalities are not working as expected when creating a new report.
EB: The 'Top N' and 'Bottom N' functionalities should correctly apply the specified number of top/bottom items when creating a new report.
SR:
1. Open the reporting tool.
2. Create a new report.
3. Try to use the 'Top N' or 'Bottom N' functionalities.
4. Observe that the functionalities do not work as expected.
5. The report should correctly apply the specified number of top/bottom items.
